column3: Is it sanctum you seek, my wayward children?<hex:02100103>Or perhaps you are come in search of power.
That which lies at your feet─that blessed bauble─can grant you both.<hex:02100103>You need but will it so.
Now take up your salvation and begone.<hex:02100103>Mortal agency in matters divine shall not be suffered.
I am your mother. I am your maker! I. Am. Ivalice!<hex:02100103>Consign me unto darkness and your light will be forever lost!
Prove me wrong, mortals! Make me submit─or die for your insolence!
